title: I have discovered the worst thing to happen in League.
body:
Your top laner doesn't connect until like 10 minutes in the game. The enemy jungler is Lee Sin. Your jungler doesn't do a very good job of denying the enemy top lane Nasus farm.

Oh god that was painful.

replies.body: Usually if a solo laner is AFK and I'm jungling, I'll take over their role until they appear.   Not sure I'd do that with a few champs though.  Also starting machete makes an early laneswap very painful for a jungler... your item is useless.

No, not even close.

The worst thing is when one player decides they are going to purposefully ruin the game. The worst thing about that is, you can do absolutely nothing about it. You know why? You can't leave. You can't kick them. You have literally 0 way of preventing yourself from ever encountering them again cause guess what, they are in the next game too and they are doing the very same thing.

I'd rather have a DC than a troll.

Even if you catch it in champ select, looking at their history beforehand.  Do you dodge?  That's minus three LP at least.  Already had to dodge the same day or you get the champ select glitch, you'll be losing even more.  You get punished for matchmaking pairing you with an intentional troll.

Sure he's been getting upwards of 9 reports per game, but by time anything's happened, he's already ruined over a dozen games or even more.

the type of threads i was hoping that would stay on GD. 

NO ONE CARES.
